mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two letters, Harriet Lane to Lily Macalester, 1850
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Harriet Lane, 1830-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Harriet Lane to Lily Macalester concerning her recent trip to the country and several of their mutual acquaintances, April 9, 1850. Also, letter dated May 27, 1850 from Harriet Lane to Lily Macalester concerning their mutual acquaintances, family, and friends. Includes references to Harriet Laneâ€™s uncle, President James Buchanan.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
